member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToMd5Hash(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string to a hexadecimal string.
member.remarks: Converts a string to a byte array, computes the hash, format each one as a hexadecimal string and returns a hexadecimal string.

member.remarks: Check if string is some of the words: "true", "ok", "yes", "1", "да"
